text: Ðis syndon ða landgemæro æt tademærtune ðara V hida.
Ærest of eadwardes mylne<../images/tbar.gif>on ða ealdan dic of ðære dic on mærbroc of mærbroce on<../images/tbar.gif>eastre sic of ðam sice on mærstan.

Of mær stane on ðane ealdan garan of ðan garan a be heafdan a be heafdan<../images/tbar.gif>on ðone broc of ðam broce ongean stream<../images/tbar.gif>on<../images/tbar.gif>riscbed of ðam riscbedde<../images/tbar.gif>on ðone weg.
<../images/tbar.gif>suð andlang weges<../images/tbar.gif>on<../images/tbar.gif>slæd<../images/tbar.gif>of ðan slæde up on þa ecge<../images/tbar.gif>andlang ecge on heort wyllan.
Of heort wyllan on ða ealdan styge<../images/tbar.gif>andlang styge on ðone mær pyt of ðam pytte on wilbaldes ecge of wilbaldes ecge<../images/tbar.gif>eft on eadwardes mylne.
Ðis is ðara V hida boc æt Tademær tune ðe Eadwig cyning gebocaþ Brihtrice on ece yrfe.
